snippet.title: Arcade Game: Goalie Ghost (1984 Bally/Sente)
snippet.description:
A sports/soccer game where you must catch and paddle a ball and prevent it from getting past you and try getting past your opponent. New rounds begin with 1 to 3 balls in the center of the playfield. If the ball is in front of you, you kick it towards your opponent, But if it's high, you must jump to catch it and hit it. 

This game is very similar to a ball-and-paddle game like the original Pong game in 1972.

Note: Used the score modifier cheat.
